capoo.title: 貓貓蟲咖波
capoo.blurb: 台灣藝術家亞拉所創造的著名角色
capoo.desc: 像貓又像蟲的六隻腳小萌物，看到什麼都想吃，包括自己的好朋友。是由台灣漫畫家亞拉所創造出的漫畫角色

chip.title: 印刷電路板
chip.blurb: 印刷電路板內含微處理器
chip.desc: 一個印刷電路板，內含微處理器。臺灣最大且重要的產業之一就是半導體的生產.

taipei_101.title: 台北 101
taipei_101.blurb: 首都之心的代表性建築物
taipei_101.desc: 臺灣最高的建築，也曾經是震驚全世界的第一高樓。位於台北市信義計劃區，是當地居民和旅客受歡迎的目的地。他擁有商店，餐廳，以及觀景臺。這裡也是舉辦全台規模最大的煙火秀的地點。

tw_flag.title: 臺灣國旗
tw_flag.desc: 青天白日滿地紅國旗。是代表臺灣/中華民國的國 旗。由孫中山先生設計,象征自由,平等,博愛 之精神。青天白日滿地紅國旗也與中華民國政府 及其創立的政黨-國民黨(KMT)相關,但由於國民黨的歷史，這面旗幟有時會在國內會發起爭議。儘管如此，在海外的臺灣人仍會使用此國旗。這面旗幟還可以在所有國內的政府建築、國外大使館上找到。因為中共的打壓導致青天白日滿地紅無法在國際賽事被使用，甚至連“台灣、臺灣”等名稱都無法使用。

formosan_bear.title: 臺灣黑熊
formosan_bear.desc: 台灣黑熊是臺灣特有的熊種。因此在臺灣牠們被視為國家象征。牠們有著獨特且好認的V字形胸部，也是臺灣最大的陸地動物。台北的吉祥物是一隻名叫Bravo的熊。

boba_tea_bear.title: 珍珠奶茶
boba_tea_bear.desc: 珍奶是個來自於臺灣的飲品。自從被創造出來就傳播世界各地，成為了全世界最熱門的飲料之一。

tw_magpie.title: 臺灣藍鵲
tw_magpie.blurb: 著名且神聖的台灣鳥類
tw_magpie.desc: The Taiwan Blue Magpie is a bird endemic to Taiwan. It is famous for its friendliness with humans, distinctive appearance and relationship with Taiwanese aboriginal tribes, some which hold this bird sacred.

heart_baltics.title: 布列塔尼的友誼愛心
heart_baltics.blurb: 含有臺灣和布列塔尼旗幟的愛心。
heart_baltics.desc: A heart symbolising the alliance and friendship with the Baltics. Hearts on r/place are commonly used to signify strong relationships between neighbouring art communities.

heart_bretons.title: 布列塔尼友誼之心
heart_bretons.blurb: 有台灣國旗和布列塔尼民族旗的心形
heart_bretons.desc: 一顆象徵與波羅的海地區結盟與友誼的心形符號。在 r/place 上，愛心常被用來代表兩個社群之間的緊密關係。

lt_pengiun_boba.title: Lithuanian Penguin Drinking Boba Tea
lt_pengiun_boba.blurb: A refreshing symbol of friendship between the Baltics and Taiwanese communities
lt_pengiun_boba.desc: A Lithuanian penguin drinking boba tea above the Taiwanese art. When the canvas expanded vertically below the art, the Taiwan and Baltic teams raced to claim space beneath their original positions by drawing Taipei 101 and the national flags respectively. As a result, a large vertical space was claimed. The Baltics team then agreed to give the space beneath the Lithuanian (and later Estonian) portions to Taiwan. As a symbol of friendship, the Lithuanian penguin is given Taiwan's famous boba tea to drink.

indep_flag.title: 台灣旗
indep_flag.desc: The Taiwan Independence flag is a flag associated with Taiwanese nationalism and freedom, or the desire to for Taiwanese people to be independent from China. This flag has three vertical bands of green, white and green, and depicts Taiwan and surrounding islands in the center. Taiwanese independence movements have existed since the 1680s, where under Qing rule the phrase 'Every three years an uprising, every five years a rebellion' became a common phrase. Though many observers point out that Taiwan is already an independent and sovereign country, this flag is also commonly used to rally those who are critical of the actions of the Kuomintang (KMT), especially under the era of martial law. The flag also represents movements for greater international recognition for Taiwan and the ending of threats to Taiwan's sovereignity. A common anthem of the Taiwanese independence movement is 'Taiwan the Formosa', particularly the first stanza.

tw_beer.title: 台灣啤酒
tw_beer.desc: Commonly found in bars and convenience stores alike, Taiwan Beer is one of Taiwan's most famous and recognizable beverages.

apple_cider.title: 台灣蘋果西打
apple_cider.desc: Tasty and cheap, this drink can be bought in convenience stores and vending machines all over Taiwan.

tatung_rice_cooker.title: 大同電鍋
tatung_rice_cooker.desc: The Taiwanese rice cooker from the brand Tatung is Taiwan's emblematic cooking appliance, known for its durability and introduced in 1960. Even abroad, Taiwanese people will do their best to get their hands on this brand to cook rice.

tsmc_logo.title: 臺積電標誌
tsmc_logo.blurb: 台灣積體電路公司的標誌
tsmc_logo.desc: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company Limited (TSMC) is one of the most influential global semiconductor manufacturing companies in the world. It is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan, the country's tech center. 92% of the world's most advanced semiconductors are manufactured by it and its Taiwanese counterparts.
